pageContext.claim: “All of the news: ABC, CBS, NBC. CNN, I don't even watch, but I assume, you know, I know -- I'm sure, it's with CNN, but because, they're just, you know, automatically fake. But [the news about protesters in Pittsburgh] was really fake news.... But if you read this morning's New York Times or Washington Post or saw the networks, you would say it was World War 3. It's really disgraceful.”
pageContext.analysis: There was nothing "fake" about the reporting on protests in Pittsburgh during Trump's visit nor did anyone suggest they were near "World War 3." Trump may not have seen the demonstrations, but the Post reported at least 2,000 people attended.
